content.body: just wondering, are tests for some stage 2/3 proposals missing just because no one has created them yet or are there other reasons?
just because no one has created them yet
also, docs (`CONTRIBUTING.md`) say "stage 3" but there's also stage 2 features so is that not really a restriction (now)?
content.formatted_body: also, docs (CONTRIBUTING.md) say "stage 3" but there's also stage 2 features so is that not really a restriction (now)?

content.body: it's still a restriction; folks are welcome to write tests for stage 2 proposals but generally we keep them as open unmerged PRs
there are some that are merged, but I believe those are proposals that were previously stage 3 and got reverted
